attributes.action: replace the dartford crossing toll booths with anpr cameras
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: similar to the ones used in london to enforce the congestion charge. instead of massive queues building up  they could work in the same way. instead of motorists having to stop to pay, they could have their number plates read by the cameras and could pay online or at a post office, in advance etc.  it would also save a lot of money.
